ATTACHMENT ID: 12944443 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

[~ashutoshc], [~vgarg], could you take a look? This basically adds Project merge rule to the block with Project-Join transpose. As Project was getting in the middle, reordering of full join tree was not happening. Verified that this fixes reordering issue. Thanks

https://reviews.apache.org/r/69078/
